mapper.sql: id, regOptId, color, iconId, eventId, deviceId, max, min, position, realEventId, beid
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(b.color, a.color) color, IFNULL(b.iconId, a.iconId) iconId, IFNULL(b.eventId, a.eventId) eventId, IFNULL(b.max,a.max) max, IFNULL(b.min,a.min) min, a.eventDesc, a.eventName FROM (SELECT * FROM bas_monitor_config WHERE eventId = #{baseQuery.eventId} and beid = #{baseQuery.eventId}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM bas_anaes_monitor_config WHERE regOptId = #{baseQuery.regOptId} and beid = #{baseQuery.eventId} AND eventId = #{baseQuery.eventId} ) b ON a.eventId = b.eventId
SELECT * FROM bas_monitor_config WHERE eventId = #{baseQuery.eventId} and beid = #{baseQuery.beid}

SELECT #{baseQuery.regOptId} as regOptId,c.color,c.iconId,c.eventId,b.deviceId,c.max,c.min,c.eventDesc,c.eventName,c.mustShow,c.units,c.position from bas_device_config a,bas_device_monitor_config b, (select * from bas_monitor_config where position= #{baseQuery.position}) c where a.deviceId = b.deviceId and b.eventId = c.eventId and a.beid = b.beid and a.beid = c.beid and a.beid = #{baseQuery.beid} and c.mustShow = 1 group by c.eventId

SELECT c.* FROM bas_device_monitor_config AS dev,bas_monitor_config b,bas_device_specification c WHERE dev.eventId = b.eventId and c.deviceId = dev.deviceId and dev.beid = b.beid and dev.beid = c.beid and dev.beid = #{baseQuery.beid} and dev.eventId = #{baseQuery.eventId} and optional IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM bas_device_config WHERE bas_device_config.ENABLE = '1' and bas_device_config.beid = #{baseQuery.beid} AND dev.deviceId = bas_device_config.deviceId )
SELECT * FROM bas_anaes_monitor_config WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId} and regOptId = #{regOptId}
select eventName from bas_monitor_config where position = #{baseQuery.position} and beid = #{baseQuery.beid} GROUP BY eventName HAVING COUNT(1)>1
mapper.update: update bas_anaes_monitor_config SET color = #{color}, iconId = #{iconId}, eventId = #{eventId}, deviceId = #{deviceId}, max = #{max}, min = #{min}, realEventId = #{realEventId}, beid = #{beid} where deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_anaes_monitor_config SET color = #{color}, iconId = #{iconId}, eventId = #{eventId}, deviceId = #{deviceId}, max = #{max}, min = #{min}, realEventId = #{realEventId}, beid = #{beid} where eventId = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from bas_anaes_monitor_config where regOptId = #{regOptId} and position = #{position} and eventId != '91001'
mapper.select: SELECT c.*,b.eventId FROM bas_device_monitor_config AS dev,bas_monitor_config b,bas_device_specification c WHERE dev.eventId = b.eventId and c.deviceId = dev.deviceId and b.eventName = #{baseQuery.name} and b.position = 0 and dev.beid = b.beid and dev.beid = c.beid and dev.beid = #{baseQuery.beid} and dev.optional IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM bas_device_config WHERE bas_device_config.ENABLE = '1' and bas_device_config.beid = #{baseQuery.beid} AND dev.deviceId = bas_device_config.deviceId )
mapper.insert: insert into bas_anaes_monitor_config (id, regOptId, color, iconId, eventId, deviceId, max, min, position, realEventId, beid) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{max,jdbcType=REAL}, #{min,jdbcType=REAL}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
regOptId,
color,
iconId,
eventId,
deviceId,

min,
position,
realEventId,
beid,

mapper.update:
update bas_anaes_monitor_config
regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iconId = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eventId = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max = #{max,jdbcType=REAL},
min = #{min,jdbcType=REAL},
position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
realEventId = #{realEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_anaes_monitor_config set regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iconId = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eventId = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max = #{max,jdbcType=REAL}, min = #{min,jdbcType=REAL}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, realEventId = #{realEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
